text:
We sent our adopted fur kid to Punggol Plaza Pets' Street for grooming. Nicky was a very timid and fearful boy, but QQ is both professional and gentle with him, making him feel comfortable. I feel very reassured knowing QQ will take great care of my fur kid.

I will definitely recommend her to my friends and will continue sending Nicky there for his grooming.

We sent our dog to pet street Punggol plaza. Service was good and price was reasonable. Groomer with QQ. High recommended. Thank you for her patience.

This is the 2nd times about timing appointment.
Always ask me come early and yet have to wait another 20 mins then my turn.

Therfore I make appointments for my dog for basic grooming.
Shower. Done
Nail cutting. Done.
Trim of fur. Not done.

Can you advise me what is include in basic grooming?

The shop after the staff guy in charge no longer there ,the shop getting worse of service ,dont know how to give a good service with proper way talk to customer ,lack of knowledge about pet and product which is suitable to pet .company review also alot negative comments.
